\sctn{Implementation}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{15}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-2wjAxi-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2wjAxi-1}}}\moddef{Program Info~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2wjAxi-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
my $PROGRAM = 'blat2gff.pl';
my $VERSION = '0.1_alpha';
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{16}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{17}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-JsOEn-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-JsOEn-1}}}\moddef{Program Description~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-JsOEn-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
# #----------------------------------------------------------------#
# #                          blat2gff.pl                           #
# #----------------------------------------------------------------#
# 
#         blat2gff.pl [options] < inputfile > outputfile
#
#       Converts BLAT output files to GFF formatted files.
# 
#     Copyright (C) 2001-2003 -- Josep Francesc ABRIL FERRANDO  
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{18}\nwdocspar

\subsctn{Program outline}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{19}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}}\moddef{blat2gff~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
\LA{}PERL shebang~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}}\RA{}
#
# MODULES
#
\LA{}Use Modules~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2UqdyA-1}}\RA{}
#
# VARIABLES
#
\LA{}Global Vars~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-1}}\RA{}
#
# MAIN LOOP
#
\LA{}Main Loop~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1DW8gT-1}}\RA{}
#
# FUNCTIONS
#
\LA{}Functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-1}}\RA{}
\nwnotused{blat2gff}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{20}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{21}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-2UqdyA-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2UqdyA-1}}}\moddef{Use Modules~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2UqdyA-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{22}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{23}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-1}}}\moddef{Global Vars~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
my @frame = (3,1,2);
my %blat = (
    STRAND =>  8,
    Q_NAME =>  9,
    Q_LEN  => 10,
    Q_ORI  => 11,
    Q_END  => 12,
    T_NAME => 13,
    T_LEN  => 14,
    T_ORI  => 15,
    T_END  => 16,
    B_NUM  => 17,
    B_LEN  => 18,
    B_QPOS => 19,
    B_TPOS => 20,
    );
my %gff = ();
my $maxfields = 21;
my %group = ();
my ($group_cnt, $rec_cnt) = (0) x 2;
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-2}}\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{24}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{25}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1DW8gT-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1DW8gT-1}}}\moddef{Main Loop~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1DW8gT-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
while (<STDIN>) \{
    my @f = ();
    next unless /^\\d/o;
    chomp;
    @f = split /\\s+/og, $_;
    do \{ # ensure that there are 21 fields
        print STDERR "### NOT enough fields for this record:\\n##### @f \\n";
        next;
    \} unless scalar(@f) == $maxfields;
    %gff = ();
    ++$rec_cnt;
    $f[$blat\{STRAND\}] =~ /(.)(.)/og && 
        ($gff\{Q_STRAND\} = $1, $gff\{T_STRAND\} = $2);
    do \{ # ensure that strands are +/- 
        print STDERR "### CANNOT find strand for this record:\\n##### @f \\n";
        next;
    \} unless ($gff\{Q_STRAND\} =~ /[+-]/o && $gff\{T_STRAND\} =~ /[+-]/o);   
    $f[$blat\{Q_NAME\}] =~ m\{/?([^/]+)$\}og && ($gff\{Q_NAME\} = $1) ;
    $f[$blat\{T_NAME\}] =~ m\{/?([^/]+)$\}og && ($gff\{T_NAME\} = $1) ;
    defined($group\{"$gff\{T_NAME\}.$gff\{T_STRAND\}"\}) || 
        ($group\{"$gff\{T_NAME\}.$gff\{T_STRAND\}"\} = ++$group_cnt);
    $gff\{GROUP\} = $group\{"$gff\{T_NAME\}.$gff\{T_STRAND\}"\};
    $gff\{Q_LEN\} = $f[$blat\{Q_LEN\}]; # seq lengths are OK
    $gff\{T_LEN\} = $f[$blat\{T_LEN\}];
    $gff\{Q_ORI\} = $f[$blat\{Q_ORI\}] + 1; # HSP coords start at 0, not at 1
    $gff\{Q_END\} = $f[$blat\{Q_END\}] + 1;
    $gff\{T_ORI\} = $f[$blat\{T_ORI\}] + 1;
    $gff\{T_END\} = $f[$blat\{T_END\}] + 1;
    $gff\{Q_FRAME\} =
        &get_frame($gff\{Q_STRAND\}, $gff\{Q_LEN\}, $gff\{Q_ORI\}, $gff\{Q_END\});
    $gff\{T_FRAME\} = 
        &get_frame($gff\{T_STRAND\}, $gff\{T_LEN\}, $gff\{T_ORI\}, $gff\{T_END\});
    $gff\{B_NUM\} = $f[$blat\{B_NUM\}];
    @\{ $gff\{B_LEN\} \}  = split /,/og, $f[$blat\{B_LEN\}];
    @\{ $gff\{B_QPOS\} \} = split /,/og, $f[$blat\{B_QPOS\}];
    @\{ $gff\{B_TPOS\} \} = split /,/og, $f[$blat\{B_TPOS\}];
    printf STDOUT "# ".$GFFstring,
        $gff\{Q_NAME\}, "BLAT","$gff\{Q_LEN\}:$gff\{T_LEN\}", 
            $gff\{Q_ORI\}, $gff\{Q_END\}, 0, $gff\{Q_STRAND\}, $gff\{Q_FRAME\},
        "$gff\{T_NAME\}.$gff\{GROUP\}.$rec_cnt",
            $gff\{T_ORI\}, $gff\{T_END\}, $gff\{T_STRAND\}, $gff\{T_FRAME\};
    &loop_HSPs($rec_cnt);
\}; # while read input

exit(0);
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{26}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{27}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-1}}}\moddef{Functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
sub get_frame() \{
    my ($strand,$len,$ori,$end) = @_;
    if ($strand eq '-') \{
       return $frame[(($len - $end + 1) % 3)];
    \} else \{
       return $frame[($ori % 3)];
    \}
\} # get_frame
sub get_hsp() \{
    my ($s,$L,$l,$n) = @_;
    my ($o,$e);
    if ($s eq '-') \{
        $e = $L - $n;
        $o = $e - $l
    \} else \{
        $o = $n;
        $e = $o + $l;
    \};
    $o++; $e++; # HSP coords start at 0, not at 1
    return ($o, $e, &get_frame($s,$L,$o,$e));
\} # get_hsp
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-2}}\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{28}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{29}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-2}}}\moddef{Global Vars~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Zqz0k-2G53d8-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
# GetSRsAln.pl like:
#$srs->\{QUERY\}\\t$blst_prg\\tsr\\t$srs->\{START_Q\}\\t$srs->\{END_Q\}
#\\t$srs->\{SCORE\}\\t$srs->\{STRAND_Q\}\\t$srs->\{FRAME_Q\}
#\\tTarget \\"$srs->\{SUBJECT\}\\"\\t$srs->\{START_S\}\\t$srs->\{END_S\}
#\\tE_value $srs->\{E_VALUE\}\\tStrand $srs->\{STRAND_S\}
#\\tFrame $srs->\{FRAME_S\}\\t\\#Projection $srs->\{PROJECTION\} 
my $GFFstring = ("\\%s\\t" x 8).'Target "%s"'.
       "\\t\\%s\\t\\%s\\tE_Value .\\tStrand \\%s\\tFrame \\%s\\n";
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{30}\nwdocspar
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{31}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-2}}}\moddef{Functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Zqz0k-1byJZg-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
sub loop_HSPs() \{
    my ($num) = @_;
    my ($c,$l,$q,$t,$qo,$qe,$qf,$to,$te,$tf);
    for ($c = 0; $c < $gff\{B_NUM\}; $c++) \{
        $l = $gff\{B_LEN\}[$c];
        $q = $gff\{B_QPOS\}[$c];
        $t = $gff\{B_TPOS\}[$c];
        ($qo,$qe,$qf) = &get_hsp($gff\{Q_STRAND\},$gff\{Q_LEN\},$l,$q);
        ($to,$te,$tf) = &get_hsp($gff\{T_STRAND\},$gff\{T_LEN\},$l,$t);
        printf STDOUT $GFFstring,
            $gff\{Q_NAME\}, "blat", "hsp", $qo, $qe, 0, $gff\{Q_STRAND\}, $qf,
            "$gff\{T_NAME\}.$gff\{GROUP\}.$num", $to, $te, $gff\{T_STRAND\}, $tf;
    \}; # for
\} # loop_HSPs
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{32}\nwdocspar

\sctn{Common code blocks}

\subsctn{PERL scripts}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{37}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}}}\moddef{PERL shebang~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1YRSM5-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
#!/usr/bin/perl -w
# This is perl, version 5.005_03 built for i386-linux
#
\LA{}Program Description~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-JsOEn-1}}\RA{}
#
\LA{}GNU License~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1j6FP6-1}}\RA{}
#
\LA{}Version Control Id Tag~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-OIzdc-1}}\RA{}
#
use strict;
#
\LA{}Program Info~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2wjAxi-1}}\RA{}
my $DATE = localtime;
my $USER = defined($ENV\{USER\}) ? $ENV\{USER\} : 'Child Process';
my $host = `hostname`;
chomp($host);
#
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-3SvXzp-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{38}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{39}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-fmRqJ-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-fmRqJ-1}}}\moddef{Global Constants - Boolean~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-fmRqJ-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
my ($T,$F) = (1,0); # for 'T'rue and 'F'alse
\eatline
\nwnotused{Global Constants - Boolean}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{40}\nwdocspar

\subsubsctn{Timing our scripts}

The '{\Tt{}Benchmark}' module encapsulates a number of routines to help to figure out how long it takes to execute a piece of code and the whole script.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{41}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1lHdNZ-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1lHdNZ-1}}}\moddef{Use Modules - Benchmark~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1lHdNZ-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
use Benchmark;
  \LA{}Timer ON~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3Km6Xm-1}}\RA{}
\nwnotused{Use Modules - Benchmark}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{42}\nwdocspar

See '{\Tt{}man\ Benchmark}' for further info about this package. 
We set an array to keep record of timing for each section.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{43}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-3Km6Xm-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3Km6Xm-1}}}\moddef{Timer ON~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3Km6Xm-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1lHdNZ-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
my @Timer = (new Benchmark);
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1lHdNZ-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{44}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{45}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-438HcI-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-438HcI-1}}}\moddef{Common PERL subs - Benchmark~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-438HcI-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
sub timing() \{
    push @Timer, (new Benchmark);
    # partial time 
    $_[0] || 
        (return timestr(timediff($Timer[$#Timer],$Timer[($#Timer - 1)])));
    # total time
    return timestr(timediff($Timer[$#Timer],$Timer[0]));
\} # timing
\nwnotused{Common PERL subs - Benchmark}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{46}\nwdocspar


\subsubsctn{Printing complex Data Structures}

With '{\Tt{}Data::Dumper}' we are able to pretty print complex data structures for debugging them.


\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{47}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-2dHpNt-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2dHpNt-1}}}\moddef{Use Modules - Dumper~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2dHpNt-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
use Data::Dumper;
local $Data::Dumper::Purity = 0;
local $Data::Dumper::Deepcopy = 1;
\nwnotused{Use Modules - Dumper}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{48}\nwdocspar


\subsubsctn{Common functions}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{49}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-3htOD4-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3htOD4-1}}}\moddef{Skip comments and empty records~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3htOD4-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
next if /^\\#/o;
next if /^\\s*$/o;
chomp;
\nwnotused{Skip comments and empty records}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{50}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{51}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-2nKdeZ-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2nKdeZ-1}}}\moddef{Common PERL subs - Min Max~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-2nKdeZ-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
#
sub max() \{
    my $z = shift @_;
    foreach my $l (@_) \{ $z = $l if $l > $z \};
    return $z;
\} # max
sub min() \{
    my $z = shift @_;
    foreach my $l (@_) \{ $z = $l if $l < $z \};
    return $z;
\} # min
\nwnotused{Common PERL subs - Min Max}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{52}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{53}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-6P62D-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-6P62D-1}}}\moddef{Common PERL subs - Text fill~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-6P62D-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
#
sub fill_right() \{ $_[0].($_[2] x ($_[1] - length($_[0]))) \}
sub fill_left()  \{ ($_[2] x ($_[1] - length($_[0]))).$_[0] \}
sub fill_mid()   \{ 
    my $l = length($_[0]);
    my $k = int(($_[1] - $l)/2);
    ($_[2] x $k).$_[0].($_[2] x ($_[1] - ($l+$k)));
\} # fill_mid
\nwnotused{Common PERL subs - Text fill}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{54}\nwdocspar

These functions are used to report to STDERR a single char for each record processed (useful for reporting parsed records).

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{55}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-3M6o7v-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3M6o7v-1}}}\moddef{Common PERL subs - Counter~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3M6o7v-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
#
sub counter \{ # $_[0]~current_pos++ $_[1]~char
    print STDERR "$_[1]";
    (($_[0] % 50) == 0) && (print STDERR "[".&fill_left($_[0],6,"0")."]\\n");
\} # counter
#
sub counter_end \{ # $_[0]~current_pos   $_[1]~char
    (($_[0] % 50) != 0) && (print STDERR "[".&fill_left($_[0],6,"0")."]\\n");
\} # counter_end
\nwnotused{Common PERL subs - Counter}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{56}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{57}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1Nm2vN-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1Nm2vN-1}}}\moddef{Global Vars - Counter~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1Nm2vN-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
my ($n,$c); # counter and char (for &counter function)
\eatline
\nwnotused{Global Vars - Counter}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{58}\nwdocspar

\subsubsctn{Common functions for reporting program processes}
\label{sec:messagerpt}

Function '{\Tt{}report}' requires that a hash variable '{\Tt{}{\%}MessageList}' has been set, such hash contains the strings for each report message we will need. The first parameter for '{\Tt{}report}' is a key for that hash, in order to retrieve the message string, the other parameters passed are processed by the {\Tt{}sprintf} function on that string.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{59}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-1}}}\moddef{Common PERL subs - STDERR~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
sub report() \{ print STDERR sprintf($MessageList\{ shift @_ \},@_) \}
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-2}}\nwnotused{Common PERL subs - STDERR}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{60}\nwdocspar

The same happens to '{\Tt{}warn}' function which also requires a hash variable '{\Tt{}{\%}ErrorList}' containing the error messages.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{61}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-2}}}\moddef{Common PERL subs - STDERR~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Zqz0k-1brk4i-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
sub warn() \{ print STDERR sprintf($ErrorList\{ shift @_ \}, @_) \}
\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{62}\nwdocspar

\subsctn{BASH scripts}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{63}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-3AESL2-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3AESL2-1}}}\moddef{BASH shebang~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3AESL2-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
#!/usr/bin/bash
# GNU bash, version 2.03.6(1)-release (i386-redhat-linux-gnu)
\LA{}Version Control Id Tag~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-OIzdc-1}}\RA{}
#
SECONDS=0 # Reset Timing
# Which script are we running...
L="####################"
\{ echo "$L$L$L$L";
  echo "### RUNNING [$0]";
  echo "### Current date:`date`";
  echo "###"; \} 1>&2;
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{64}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{65}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-4tyAT-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4tyAT-1}}}\moddef{BASH script end~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4tyAT-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\{ echo "###"; echo "### Execution time for [$0] : $SECONDS secs";
  echo "$L$L$L$L";
  echo ""; \} 1>&2;
#
exit 0
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{66}\nwdocspar

\newpage %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\sctn{Extracting code blocks from this document}

From this file we can obtain both the code and the
documentation. The following instructions are needed:

\subsctn{Extracts Script code chunks from the {\noweb} file} % \\[-0.5ex]

Remember when tangling that '-L' option allows you to include program line-numbering relative to original {\noweb} file. Then the first line of the executable files is a comment, not a shebang, and must be removed to make scripts runnable.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{71}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}}}\moddef{tangling~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
# showing line numbering comments in program
notangle -L -R"blat2gff" $WORK/$nwfile.nw | \\
    perl -ne '$.>1 && print' | cpif $BIN/blat2gff.pl ;
chmod a+x $BIN/blat2gff.pl ;
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-2}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-3}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-4}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-5}}\nwnotused{tangling}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{72}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{73}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-2}}}\moddef{tangling~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
# reformating program with perltidy
notangle -R"blat2gff" $WORK/$nwfile.nw | \\
    perltidy - | cpif $BIN/blat2gff.pl ;
# html pretty-printing program with perltidy
notangle -R"blat2gff" $WORK/$nwfile.nw | \\
    perltidy -html - | cpif $DOCS/html/blat2gff.html ;
#
\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{74}\nwdocspar

\subsctn{Extracting different Config Files} % \\[-0.5ex]

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{75}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-3}}}\moddef{tangling~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-2}{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-4}\nwenddeflinemarkup
notangle -R"BLAT output example" $WORK/$nwfile.nw | \\
         cpif $DATA/output.blat ;
\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{76}%$

\subsctn{Extracting documentation and \LaTeX{}'ing it} % \\[-0.5ex] %'

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{77}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-4}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-4}}}\moddef{tangling~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-3}{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-5}\nwenddeflinemarkup
notangle -Rweaving  $WORK/$nwfile.nw | cpif $WORK/nw2tex ;
notangle -RLaTeXing $WORK/$nwfile.nw | cpif $WORK/ltx ;
chmod a+x $WORK/nw2tex $WORK/ltx;
\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{78}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{79}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-45eh1w-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-45eh1w-1}}}\moddef{tangling complementary LaTeX files~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-45eh1w-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
notangle -R"HIDE: LaTeX new definitions" $WORK/$nwfile.nw | cpif $DOCS/defs.tex ;
notangle -R"HIDE: TODO" $WORK/$nwfile.nw | cpif $DOCS/todo.tex ; 
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{80}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{81}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}}}\moddef{weaving~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
\LA{}BASH shebang~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3AESL2-1}}\RA{}
# weaving and LaTeXing
\LA{}BASH Environment Variables~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4Sj5V-1}}\RA{}
\LA{}tangling complementary LaTeX files~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-45eh1w-1}}\RA{}
noweave -v -t4 -delay -x -filter 'elide "HIDE: *"' \\
        $WORK/$nwfile.nw | cpif $DOCS/$nwfile.tex ;
# noweave -t4 -delay -index $WORK/$nwfile.nw > $DOCS/$nwfile.tex 
pushd $DOCS/ ;
#
latex $nwfile.tex ;
dvips $nwfile.dvi -o $nwfile.ps -t a4 ;
#
popd;
\LA{}BASH script end~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4tyAT-1}}\RA{}
\nwnotused{weaving}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{82}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{83}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}}\moddef{LaTeXing~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
\LA{}BASH shebang~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-3AESL2-1}}\RA{}
# only LaTeXing
\LA{}BASH Environment Variables~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4Sj5V-1}}\RA{}
pushd $DOCS/ ;
#
echo "### RUNNING LaTeX on $nwfile.tex" 1>&2 ;
latex $nwfile.tex ; 
latex $nwfile.tex ; 
latex $nwfile.tex ;
dvips $nwfile.dvi -o $nwfile.ps -t a4 ;
#
# pdflatex $nwfile.tex ;
echo "### CONVERTING PS to PDF: $nwfile" 1>&2 ;
ps2pdf $nwfile.ps $nwfile.pdf ;
#
popd ;
\LA{}BASH script end~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4tyAT-1}}\RA{}
\nwnotused{LaTeXing}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{84}%$

\subsctn{Defining working shell variables for the current project} % \\[-0.5ex]

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{85}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-4Sj5V-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4Sj5V-1}}}\moddef{BASH Environment Variables~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-4Sj5V-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
#
# Setting Global Variables
# WORK is now set via setcwd
BIN="$WORK/bin" ;
PARAM="$BIN/param" ;
DOCS="$WORK/docs" ;
DATA="$WORK/data" ;
nwfile="blat2gff" ;
export WORK BIN PARAM DOCS DATA nwfile ;
#
\nwused{\\{NW4Zqz0k-eXNgS-1}\\{NW4Zqz0k-1Y1TKL-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{86}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{87}\sublabel{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-5}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-5}}}\moddef{tangling~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Zqz0k-1bBPRa-4}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
# 
# BASH Environment Variables
notangle -R'BASH Environment Variables' $WORK/$nwfile.nw | \\
         cpif $WORK/.bash_VARS ; 
source $WORK/.bash_VARS ;
#
\nwendcode{}
